title: Refugee documents journey for family reunification
description: Refugee documents journey for family reunification
content:
Scenario: Refugee documents journey for family reunification
    Given Amira is working toward bringing her family to Germany
    When she documents her journey and establishes housing and employment
    And she needs to prove family relationships for legal process
    Then critical documents are cryptographically secured
    And they're backed up across sanctuary institutions
    And the documentation supports family reunification application
    And legal aid organizations can access needed evidence
    And the family reunification process is supported by secure documentation
